resources.string: The Galactic Republic is in turmoil. There are protests against the taxation of trade routes to star systems. Hoping to solve the problem with a blockade of deadly cruisers, the greedy Trade Federation has stopped all shipments to the small planet of Naboo. While the Republic Congress endlessly debates this alarming chain of events, the Supreme Chancellor has secretly dispatched two Jedi Knights, the galaxy\'s guardians of peace and justice, to resolve the conflict...
